customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Things have been very busy at the Association, so I haven't had much time to play the game recently. Fair warning, I'm pretty strong, though."
Kurisu opens his Casket of Tomes, revealing a deck organized around "Kamisato Ayaka," "Yoimiya," and "Xingqiu."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: When Action Phase begins, the active characters on both sides will be affected by Pyro.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Kamisato Ayaka
customize.desc:
"Frostflake Heron" Kamisato Ayaka

As graceful as the frost drifting in the wind, as elegant as a heron perched in a courtyard.

customize.name: Yoimiya
customize.desc:
"Frolicking Flames" Yoimiya

Captain and Vanguard of Team Naganohara for the 11th Hanamizaka Street Invitational.

customize.name: Xingqiu
customize.desc:
"Juvenile Galant" Xingqiu

"Is it just me, or are the protagonists in novels nowadays all students of some private school or another..."

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
The president of the International Trade Association has already sorted out his deck and Character Cards. Now, he sits quietly at the table, waiting for players to take on the Adventure Challenge that he has set up.

customize.name: Ningguang
customize.desc:
"Eclipsing Star" Ningguang

The greatest secret she keeps is that she keeps a great many of Liyue's secrets.

customize.name: Ganyu
customize.desc:
"Plenilune Gaze" Ganyu

"This press release is due tomorrow… I suppose I could work through the night and get it done.”

customize.name: Keqing
customize.desc:
"Driving Thunder" Keqing

She can build decks heretofore not conceived and win battles in which victory is unthinkable.
